text: The port of Erengrad serves as the second-largest trade hub in the Old World. Its bustling docks are filled with exotic treasures from across the globe, including weapons powerful enough to crush any foe.

Praag is a city of contradictions, blending the taint of Chaos with noble faith. Despite its struggles, Praag remains part of Kislev, and these ascetic warriors, imbued with Ursun's blood, will cleanse the city's sins with fire and blood.
The Sons of Ursun are Kislev's champion warriors, often seen serving as the elite guard of the Bokha Palace. They are symbols of Ursun's might and the embodiment of Kislev's indomitable strength.
